resources.string:
An overdraft is a credit facility linked to your cheque account. 

It acts as a safety net for unexpected expenses. 

Subject to credit and affordability assessment.
Your net when you fall short
Are you currently receiving debt counselling, have a pending debt review application or insolvent?
Have you ever been insolvent or under debt review?
I have a pending debt counselling application
Unfortunately you cannot apply for an overdraft as you do not currently meet the minimum requirements.
You may qualify for an overdraft of up to \nR %s
To learn more about overdraft, go to www.absa.co.za
If you consent to the following, we can open your account right now.
Please read and confirm the declaration
I understand that my income, expenses and credit bureau information will be used to assess whether I qualify for the overdraft.
I have the spousal consent required to enter into this agreement, if I am married, or deemed to be married, in community of property or under foreign law.
I have read and I accept the Personal Client Agreement.
I have read and understood all of the declarations above and I confirm that they are correct.
Some details are missing from your profile. Please logon to Absa online or visit your nearest branch to update your details.
I would like to receive information about Absa products, special offers and rewards.
Please select a preferred method of communication
Please confirm the below selections before we continue
Enter an amount that is more than or equal to minimum overdraft amount
If I am in default under any credit agreement with the bank that is governed by the NCA, I choose that the prescribed notice to inform me of my default and rights, be delivered to me
By registered mail to my last postal address provided.
Hand delivered to my last physical address provided.
I have read and I accept the Terms and Conditions.
An affordable plan that settles the outstanding balance in case of death, permanent disability, dreaded diseases or retrenchment.
Would you like a credit protection plan?
You are unable to continue your application on the App. Please log onto Absa Online to apply.
Initiation fee to be charged up front
Discount on contractual annual interest rate
Total cost of credit divided by the credit limit
If you use your overdraft fully at the start and repay it monthly over 12 months, without using it again.

Initial fee to be changed up front

I accept the Terms and Conditions.
I have read and accepted the Terms and Conditions
If you wish to re-apply in future, please log on to Absa Online or call 0860 100 372 to apply
Feel free to comeback anytime to apply for a personal loan.
Call us on 0860100372 to make your decision. Please use your ID number as a reference. Remember, you have 5 business days from today to do this.
Call us on 0860 100 372 to finalise your application. Please use your ID number as a reference
Your approved overdraft amount will be deposited into your account soon.
Are you sure you want to reject this quote?
If you reject the quotation, the quote will be cancelled and you will have to re-apply for this overdraft.
Are you sure you want to decide later?
This quote is only valid for 5 business days from today and you will need to contact our call centre
We are not able to update your income and expenses on the App for now. Please logon to Absa Online to apply.
You qualify for the following overdraft facility
Unfortunately your application is unsuccessful. Please call 0860 100 372 to find out more.

You cannot proceed without accepting the terms and conditions

Itâ€™s a credit facility linked to your business Cheque account to help you manage your cashflow, projects and seasonal business activities.

It acts as a safety net for unexpected expenses.

Subject to either credit or affordability assessment.
I give permission to Absa to use my details to perform a credit assessment and verification.
Absa may share information regarding my credit worthiness and score to third parties in accordance with the Privacy Policy.
I have read and I accept the Business Client Agreement.
We are unable to submit your application on the app. Please log onto Absa online to do your application.
